body_html:
Thanx for researching where the project_id got lost @F3PiX 🙏

If it's really no longer used, I'd vote for a) either renaming the column to deprecated_project_id and then removing it later or b) straight away removing it (in favor). This can in my opinion even be done within the scope of this issue - it's just a tiny migration after all.

The way it is set up now, it's only confusing people 🙈

Thanx for researching where the `project_id` got lost @F3PiX 🙏 

If it's really no longer used, I'd vote for a) either renaming the column to `deprecated_project_id` and then removing it later or b) straight away removing it *(in favor)*. This can in my opinion even be done within the scope of this issue - it's just a tiny migration after all.

The way it is set up now, it's only confusing people 🙈
